questions.question: I read each book carefully before returning it to the library
I don't hesitate when someone needs help in trouble
I always pay close attention to how I dress
At home, I behave at the table in the same way as in the dining room
There was a time(s) when I stopped doing something because I wasn't sure of my abilities
Sometimes I like to talk bad about absentees
I always listen carefully to the other person, no matter who they are
There was a time when I came up with a good reason to justify myself
I used to take advantage of a person's mistake
Sometimes, instead of forgiving a person, I try to repay them in kind
There were times when I insisted on doing it my way
I don't have an internal protest when I'm asked to do a service
I never get annoyed when people express the opposite opinion to me
Before a long trip, I always think carefully about what to take with me
There were times when I envied the luck of others
Sometimes I get annoyed by people who ask me to do something
When people are in trouble, I sometimes think they got what they deserved
I've never said unpleasant things with a smile
